body: Didn't expect sabito with gopanchiro,but okay i guess
Then don't. You already know what's to come from tag/ cover, and no-one is forcing you to read it and you're in a pirating site.

I'm sorry I know it's their own preference but I can't stand seeing Sabito and Tanjirou being paired together. And thou Tanjirou IS charming as the top, but my image of Sabito is completely opposite of this which makes it hard to keep on reading
